name: Project Throwback
description:
An experimental bio-weapon, code named, Project Throwback, is let loose in the secret government lab, where you work. All your co-workers are infected, and have reverted back to their primal state of low intelligence, and high aggression.  You must search the facility for the 5 ingredients, and 5 supply items needed to craft a cure, before it's too late.

Controls:
 - WASD (Walk)
 - ENTER (Fire Weapon)
 - LEFT SHIFT (Reload Weapon)
 - SPACE BAR (Interact, Open, Pickup)

Credits:

Game was submitted for #GitHubGameOff Game Jam.

Art/Music/Design/Programming: Kris Michael (http://twitter.com/krismichael) 
Additional Art: Kenney (http://kenney.nl/)
Fonts: Google Fonts (http://google.com/fonts/) 
Engine: Godot Engine (http://godotengine.org/) 

Source:

Source files: https://github.com/krismichael/project-throwback

You are free to download, and use any of the files you want, but please keep in mind that as of Version 1.0.0 the code is very sloppy, given the 30-day deadline for this game jam. Future versions, will be improved, and always open-source.

Additional:

Suggestions are always welcome, as this project will be updated a few times after the #GitHubGameOff judging is completed. Additional platform support will also be added at a later date.

Updates:

- 06/19/2018: Added MacOSX and Linux version.
- 06/18/2018: Added new Window Executable.
